previewArticle.title: DC United vs. Montreal Impact | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: DC United 1, Montreal Impact 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The Montreal Impact kick off the 2015 season by traveling to America's capital to take on D.C. United.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: D.C. United vs. Montreal Impact

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Paulo Alvaro
timelineItems.text: #dcu celebrating since 1996! 2015 home opener!

timelineItems.comment: Chris Pontius (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Mario Pacioretty
timelineItems.text: This team is exciting, hoping for a great season! #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Montreal Impact. Nigel Reo-Coker tries a through ball, but Jack McInerney is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: XI @impactmontreal | Bush; Toia, Ciman, Soumare, Camara; Mallace, Reo-Coker, Duka, Piatti, Mapp; McInerney: http://t.co/RbatmPcfoN #DCvMTL

timelineItems.name: D.C. United
timelineItems.text: Congrats to @ChrisRolfe17 on his 200th #MLS appearance and @JairoArrieta25 on his first! #DCvMTL #DCU

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 1 - DC United have won one and lost four of their last five season openers in @MLS, conceding 11 goals in the five games. Worry. #DCvMTL

timelineItems.name: Sean Maslin
timelineItems.text: So far #dcu really look towards exposing #imfc on the left side. Reo-Coker really doing well to track Pontius though

timelineItems.name: Anthony Galante
timelineItems.text: Baky Soumare was just referred to as a "tower of power." He's the Leaning Tower of Pisa of defenders. #DCvMTL #cf97

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Dilly Duka (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Dilly Duka's chance is deflected for a corner

timelineItems.name: D.C. United
timelineItems.text: #DCU Supporters honor the Gemmell family today with a minute of silence from the 10:41 match mark. Players also honoring with arm bands.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Dilly Duka (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Ignacio Piatti.
Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Steve Birnbaum.

timelineItems.name: RDS in English
timelineItems.text: RT Arnaud has the mandate to monitor Piatti and does good so far #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Aaron Stollar
timelineItems.text: Duka v. Franklin is looking problematic so far for #dcu

timelineItems.name: Tim Coyne
timelineItems.text: Man #IMFC are dangerous on the counter #DCvMTL #MLS

timelineItems.name: Sean Maslin
timelineItems.text: Going to be interesting to see how both teams respond to playing a second match in such a short period of time #dcu #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Offside, D.C. United. Chris Korb tries a through ball, but Jairo Arrieta is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: NC
timelineItems.text: Bush in purple. That's a lovable sight. #IMFC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Chris Pontius (D.C. United) left footed shot from the center of the box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Chris Pontius nearly capitalizes on an Impact turnover

timelineItems.name: Jonathan M. Smith
timelineItems.text: Classy of @dcunited players to wear black arm bands to honor the Gemmel family #dcu

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Chris Pontius (D.C. United) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Jairo Arrieta.

timelineItems.name: AllAmerican Soccer
timelineItems.text: Wow. Great job by Arrieta, Pontius over thought that too much #DCvMTL

timelineItems.name: Ata Dizdar
timelineItems.text: A way better finish was necessary there from Pontius. That needs to be put away. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: Ciman plays with fire a lot, and he just got burned there by Arrieta. He's lucky that Pontius shot went wide. #DCvMTL

timelineItems.name: BrianWilde
timelineItems.text: Quite a lot more composed so far out there. Doesn't feel like they're just hanging on like last year. Better possession. Still early. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Leanne Elston
timelineItems.text: Home. #DCU

timelineItems.name: David Harrity
timelineItems.text: Time to get the 2015 @MLS season opener for @dcunited v @impactmontreal started! #dcu http://t.co/rHD8nJYHlL

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Day 2. Game on. #DCvMTL --> http://t.co/zsYcERvcSH (sparkybish on Instagram) http://t.co/XPBVFet3gs

timelineItems.name: Ryan vanBrackel
timelineItems.text: #dcu #mls season opener. Vamos united!!

timelineItems.name: Joey R.
timelineItems.text: Liking this Arrieta guy... #DCU #DCUvMTL

timelineItems.name: Art Vandelay ن
timelineItems.text: The highlight of this game so far is the pitch. Well done to the team who cleared it. #dcu

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, D.C. United 1, Montreal Impact 0.

timelineItems.name: The Bolivian Yank
timelineItems.text: Miguel Aguilar is really going to be something. Confidence, skillful with ball and aggressive play defensively. I like it. #DCU #DCUvMTL

timelineItems.name: Dominic Palumbo 
timelineItems.text: Big win to start the season!!! #DCU

timelineItems.name: D.C. United
timelineItems.text: That's three points. Final. #DCU 1, #IMFC 0. First season-opening victory since 2011.

timelineItems.name: Doran Stucky
timelineItems.text: Bravo Aguilar!! #DCvMTL

timelineItems.name: AllAmerican Soccer
timelineItems.text: Good showing by United, but Montreal is going to have show more in attack if they want to avoid another poor season. #DCvMTL

timelineItems.name: D.C. United
timelineItems.text: Amazing day for this #OpeningWeekend win!!! Final: DCU 1 - MTL 0

timelineItems.name: Nader Hussein (نادر)
timelineItems.text: The match is over in the Nation's Capital, with DC United victorious in their season opener, 1-0 over the Montreal Impact. #DCUnited #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Quinn GM
timelineItems.text: Fantastic win @dcunited!! #DCU #MSL #DCUvMTL Keep it up Black and Red!

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: #DCU holds on for the 1-0 win. It wasn't pretty, but Ben Olsen will take every point he can get without Espindola, Silva, Halsti and EJ.

timelineItems.name: Andy Lohman
timelineItems.text: The new guys Arrieta and Aguilar were impressive, but Boswell and Birnbaum were absolutely crucial in central defense. Nice win #DCU

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Big win for #DCU after crashing out of Champions League

timelineItems.name: Nick Sabetti
timelineItems.text: FT: Montreal fall 1-0 to D.C. Up until last 15 minutes, Impact lacked rhythm and intensity; struggled to recover and keep possession. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Ryan Brister
timelineItems.text: After differing results in midweek, #DCU tops #IMFC 1-0 to start their #MLS seasons.

timelineItems.desc: The Montreal Impact kick off the 2015 season by traveling to America's capital to take on D.C. United.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: D.C. United vs. Montreal Impact | March 7, 2015

timelineItems.name: Shawn Richardson
timelineItems.text: #dcu starting to look dangerous. #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  D.C. United. Conceded by Bakary Soumaré.

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: Good start for Montreal, have to say I didn't expect much and if a little more clinical in final third could be up 2 #DCvMTL

timelineItems.name: Andrew
timelineItems.text: I think I'm a big Arrieta fan already #DCU

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Davy Arnaud (D.C. United).
Nigel Reo-Coker (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: FootDribbler
timelineItems.text: #DC is moving the ball well going forward #DCvMTL

timelineItems.name: Sean Coleman
timelineItems.text: Third game that I'm underwhelmed by #IMFC's holding midfielders. I'll be watching Reo-Coker intently.

timelineItems.comment: Chris Rolfe (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Pablo A. Ortiz
timelineItems.text: After 20: good game for #IMFC. Piatti slightly out of synch, Mapp needs to get involved. Good game for Mallace as starter.

timelineItems.name: Trevor
timelineItems.text: La Bara Brava #matchday #dcunited #dcu #groundhopping #mls #rfk #soccer #football #footballday #supportyourlocalteam #impactmontreal

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Chris Rolfe (D.C. United) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Chris Pontius.
Steve Birnbaum (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Sean Maslin
timelineItems.text: Arrieta and Rolfe really working on Reo-Coker and Ciman right now. They have the pace, but the #imfc duo have good positioning. #dcu

timelineItems.name: daniel
timelineItems.text: Mallace, semble de plus en plus confiant dans son rôle #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Shawn Richardson
timelineItems.text: I would like to see shorter passes to try and build up instead of just launching the ball down the field. #imfc

timelineItems.name: Shawn Richardson
timelineItems.text: Toia looking pretty solid so far. Who needs Oyungo? #imfc

timelineItems.name: Xenia D.
timelineItems.text: Missed my #DCU boys! VAMOS UNITED! #DCvMTL #OpeningWeekend #MLS http://t.co/paNl59uGTv

timelineItems.name: Tim Coyne
timelineItems.text: I'm not sure Ciman is prepared for #MLS. Very lackadaisical so far #DCvMTL #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Chris Korb (D.C. United) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Chris Rolfe.

timelineItems.name: Rachel Philpott
timelineItems.text: Bouncing at RFK Stadium. Go #DCUnited #DCU!

timelineItems.name: Sean Maslin
timelineItems.text: #imfc at the center of the pitch...very stable, they do not give up too much space. #dcu really trying to push them out of position.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Dilly Duka.
Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Bobby Boswell.

timelineItems.name: Sean Coleman
timelineItems.text: #IMFC has to move the ball through the mid and up better. Too much defending and turning it over without offensive chances.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Donny Toia (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Bill Hamid dives to deny a Donny Toia blast

timelineItems.name: Matthew ∞ Weber;;
timelineItems.text: I absolutely love the way @HassCamara6 plays! What a beast!!! #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Donny Toia (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Justin Mapp.
Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Bill Hamid.

timelineItems.name: Drew Zuhosky
timelineItems.text: 32' Good defensive struggle going on here. Neither side has bent or broke. #DCvMTL #MLSFirstKick #MLS #OpeningWeekend

timelineItems.name: AllAmerican Soccer
timelineItems.text: That right there is why Sean Johnson and Bill Hamid are not in the same conversation. #DCvMTL

timelineItems.name: Shawn Richardson
timelineItems.text: Beautiful shot by Toia! #imfc #dcu

timelineItems.name: Derek
timelineItems.text: Bobby with the roadblock, nice. #dcu

timelineItems.name: Don
timelineItems.text: "Bobby Boswell...THOU SHALT NOT PASS" - @SebiSalazarCSN #DCU

timelineItems.name: KAN Football Club
timelineItems.text: Still in shock by Toia's shot! Who was #IMFC left back last year again? #DEBATSSF

timelineItems.name: Payne
timelineItems.text: Watching the #DCU home opener with the biggest @chrisrolfe fan out there, #fuzzyduck. #tialoca #rfk #FanSince96

timelineItems.name: World Klaas
timelineItems.text: Lot of people criticizing Reo-Coker, but I’m happy with him so far. Just needs to release the ball half a second earlier. Great DM. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Denny Stamos
timelineItems.text: Wow #IMFC 4-5-1 that's different!

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Piatti shines when Montreal has possession and more rhythm in the midfield #imfc #dcu

timelineItems.name: Anthony Galante
timelineItems.text: Not sure if I'm watching DC v Montreal, or a Chicago Fire game. #DCU #IMFC #cf97

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Chris Pontius (D.C. United) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Davy Arnaud.

timelineItems.text: Korb excellent touch on the outside #dcu #imfc

timelineItems.name: Sarah
timelineItems.text: We look solid so far today. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: Boswell and Ciman are locked in an intense battle to see which center back can roam farther forward. #DCvMTL

timelineItems.name: Anthony DeAngelo
timelineItems.text: Moments like that from Pontius that remind us how wonderful he is #DCU

timelineItems.name: Seth Vertelney
timelineItems.text: Better from #DCU as this half has gone on. Flashes from Pontius, Rolfe and DeLeon but more final third combinations needed. Arrieta quiet

timelineItems.text: I can tell there's a couple of times that De Leon wants the ball when he's wide open on that right flank. He's frustrated. #dcu

timelineItems.text: Klopas : "Nous devons repartir vers l'avant plus vite en transition" #IMFC #RDS

timelineItems.text: Arrieta has a clever skill set that should fit in well with Espindola and Silva once those players are back. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Derek
timelineItems.text: Still moving the ball well. #dcu

timelineItems.name: Rachel Bonnetta
timelineItems.text: WARNING: If you’re watching #DCvMTL- You have 5 more mins to find another screen because @PhilaUnion is taking on @ColoradoRapids at 4:00

timelineItems.name: Michael Lipin
timelineItems.text: With the @ScreamingEagles @ #RFKStadium as @dcunited faces #montrealimpact! Great crowd here #mls @ussoccer #dcu http://t.co/1ZLgYlFKZm

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: We're 0-0 at half of #DCvMTL. Jairo Arrieta looking good in his @dcunited debut. #DCU http://t.co/AHN2GM74bb

timelineItems.name: Kelsey Patterson
timelineItems.text: Two-and-a-half games into #IMFC's year and they haven't looked great, despite positive results in the Champions League.

timelineItems.name: Paul Ronca
timelineItems.text: Soumare was best player in the 1st. Toia continues to impress me (better than Brovsky). Our mids are struggling miserably with control #imfc

timelineItems.name: typicalsquirrel
timelineItems.text: Let's Go #DCU !!!! Home opener with my love and great pals!

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Piatti = dribble,power, shoot, shoot, shoot and shoot #IMFC #DCvMTL #MLS

timelineItems.name: Joe Romito
timelineItems.text: #IMFC we need a Striker, with presence , there defence needs to fear him and respect him, so far Mac. Not doing it, but I'm willing to wait

timelineItems.name: Josh Leddick
timelineItems.text: Home opener #DCU

timelineItems.name: Ross
timelineItems.text: Rolfe looking lively. #dcu @ChrisRolfe17 👏👏

timelineItems.name: Alex Frank
timelineItems.text: Vamos! United! #dcu

timelineItems.name: Lloyd Barker
timelineItems.text: 1st half: Soumare solid...Piatti floating...just like against Pachuca, more disconnected passes out of MF... HT 0-0 #IMFC #DCU

timelineItems.name: Kelly Alexander
timelineItems.text: United! #DCU

timelineItems.name: Aaron Stollar
timelineItems.text: Considering #DCU is without Silva and Espindola, the half didn't go that badly. Still, the attack was hard to watch for much of the 45.

timelineItems.name: Ross
timelineItems.text: Can't wait to see Arrieta AND Espindola play together #dcu

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Opportunity cost - Camara/Toia go up to help Duka/Mapp even more - They don't, team plays low & solely focuses on breaks #IMFC #DCvMTL #MLS

timelineItems.name: IMFC Fans
timelineItems.text: HT: 0-0. Solid half defensively, especially from Soumaré. However, much more is needed going forward if #IMFC are to find goals.

timelineItems.name: J-P Labrecque
timelineItems.text: @impactmontreal Bernier pour Reo-Coker, Alexander pour Mapp, Porter pour Jack Mac. #imfc

timelineItems.name: Xavier T
timelineItems.text: As a Belgian, it's fun to see Ciman playing here. Looking solid bit makes some risky plays at times. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: D.C. United
timelineItems.text: Back in action here at RFK! #DCvMTL #DCU

timelineItems.name: RoPo
timelineItems.text: Don't mind the counter attacking style, need some end product #imfc

timelineItems.text: Pontus can't catch a break. #DCU

Foul by Nigel Reo-Coker (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: World Klaas
timelineItems.text: Still early, but I will begin to judge the quality of the team’s performances. #DCU is also starting their season. No excuses. #IMFC

timelineItems.text: Match on Wednesday, snowstorm Thursday. Turf looking good. #DCU #DCUvMTL #VamosUnited #MLS http://t.co/0c0KMhwtHx

timelineItems.text: TAAAAAA-TAAAAAA-TAAA-TA-TAAAAAA-TAAA-TAAA-TAAA-TAAA #mlsanthemisplaying

timelineItems.name: KAN Football Club
timelineItems.text: Great build up by #imfc there. Want to see more of this. #DCU #DCvMTL #MLS

timelineItems.name: Derek
timelineItems.text: Tifo looking good. #dcu

timelineItems.name: Daniel Ruiz
timelineItems.text: Always 1 vs 2 defense; Jack Mac surround by 2-3 players: no chance at getting any good service #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: Attendance at RFK: 11,549. Not surprising considering the snow and low temperature. #DCU

timelineItems.text: RT Porter will enter #IMFC

timelineItems.text: Mapp is having a great game. #imfc #DCvMTL

timelineItems.text: Klopas’ first management error of the season. Change needed to be made at 55th minute. Bernier, Alexander and Porter sorely needed. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Wes Folkerth
timelineItems.text: 4-4-2 #IMFC

timelineItems.text: Our front 4 is too static. Move around guys. #IMFC #IMFClive #DCUvMTL

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Davy Arnaud = MLS All-Star #imfc #DCvMTL

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: The kid is going to do it again, isn't he?

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: A cool finish from @JairoArrieta25 puts the Black-and-Red in front. WATCH: http://t.co/SetHGX2Of5 #DCvMTL

timelineItems.name: Will
timelineItems.text: Mapp has been making some good crosses and it feels like Porter is potentially the only one with the ability to connect on them. #IMFC

Attempt missed. Cameron Porter (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Hassoun Camara with a cross.

timelineItems.text: Si le das espacio a @JairoArrieta25, te hace pagar, con un gol como este. VIDEO: http://t.co/56FwRhnwec #DCvMTL 1-0

timelineItems.name: IMFC Fans
timelineItems.text: #IMFC's midweek hero Callum Porter enters the fray in the place of McInerney. A lot of faith being shown in the young lad from Klopas.

timelineItems.text: Eric Alexander va entrer #IMFC #RDS

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Oh my word.

timelineItems.name: D.C. United
timelineItems.text: 76', Doyle with the goal line block! #IMFC #DCU

timelineItems.name: WTP's CoachDan
timelineItems.text: #DCU get real lucky there. Real lucky.

timelineItems.comment: Cameron Porter (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Sean Franklin (D.C. United).

timelineItems.name: Joe Marx
timelineItems.text: Conor Doyle with the game saver or maybe a handball #DCU

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: wow, huge chance for Camara but shot strikes Doyle on #DCU goal line! Bad luck for #IMFC full back #DCvMTL #MLS

timelineItems.name: Rachel Bonnetta
timelineItems.text: Doyle…taking one for the team! Rigggght in the face. OUCH #DCvMTL

timelineItems.name: lala lalala
timelineItems.text: CONOR DOYLEEEEE I LOVE THEEEE😘😘😘 #dcu #DCUvMTL

timelineItems.name: Shawn Richardson
timelineItems.text: Piatti's least effective game so far. #imfc

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: Miguel Aguilar makes his #MLS debut, coming on for Chris Rolfe. He'll have a tough defensive matchup helping with Mapp. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Was that a handball? #DCU

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Conor Doyle (D.C. United).
Eric Alexander (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Ryan Brister
timelineItems.text: Replacing Piatti with Alexander seems like the opposite of the move #IMFC should be making down a goal late.

timelineItems.name: Eric Krakauer
timelineItems.text: #DCU looking at little disorganized and nervous at the back.

timelineItems.text: Awesome to see Aguilar getting some minutes in today's #DCvMTL game #SacramentoProud

timelineItems.text: Camara clearly is not the guy you need distributing centrally for #imfc.

timelineItems.text: Sub Reo-Coker! #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Carl Mitton Marchand
timelineItems.text: OUCH!! #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Eric
timelineItems.text: Fracture du bras. Ouch !! #Mapp #IMFC #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Jean-Francois Genest
timelineItems.text: #imfc Mapp vient de se facturer le poignet.

timelineItems.name: Louie
timelineItems.text: For some reason I have a feeling porter will score on extra time! #imfc

timelineItems.name: Daniel Ruiz
timelineItems.text: Mapp injured. Bill Hamid makes an "oh no" face in reaction... doesnt look good #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Joey Alfieri
timelineItems.text: Great ball by Alexander to Mapp. Hamid comes out to stop Mapp but nasty collision. Mapp Holding onto left wrist. In serious pain #IMFC

timelineItems.name: DC United WUFC
timelineItems.text: Billy Ham is our man! #DCU - T

timelineItems.name: Tristan D'Amours
timelineItems.text: Well this looks like a nightmare for #IMFC... #whatastart

timelineItems.name: phil
timelineItems.text: NOOOO MAPP PLEASE #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Phil Leyva
timelineItems.text: Terrible to see Justin Mapp go down like that. One of my favorite players in the league. #DCvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Impact de Montréal
timelineItems.text: 86' Justin Mapp sort du match blessé. Mapp is out of the game due to an injury. Oduro IN #IMFC #DCvMTL

timelineItems.name: Andrew Wiebe
timelineItems.text: Thoughts with Justin Mapp. Someone take that producer's replay button away. #DCvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Dominic Oduro (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Attempt missed. Dominic Oduro (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right.

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Oh God. Get well, @jmapp21.

timelineItems.name: Sean Quinn
timelineItems.text: Absolutely hate to see that in a season opener. Best wishes + good health to @jmapp21. #DCvMTL

timelineItems.name: Andy Noel
timelineItems.text: Yikes, best wishes to Justin Mapp. That looks awful. #DCU #DCUvMTL

timelineItems.name: Sara Jean
timelineItems.text: Oduro has the best hair in @mls #IMFC

timelineItems.name: William Kruse
timelineItems.text: Great to have #DCU on the TV again after a long winter.

timelineItems.name: D.C. United
timelineItems.text: 90', #DCU sub: Farfan replaces goal-scorer Arrieta. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: D.C. United
timelineItems.text: Five minutes of extra time. #IMFC #DCU

timelineItems.name: Pelletier-A #IMFC
timelineItems.text: Midfield 0/10 #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: .@jmapp21 1 of only 2 #IMFC starters for #MLS opening day 2014 (Camara) - huge part of team, hope to see him again on pitch very soon

timelineItems.name: NatashaOjedaBanditto
timelineItems.text: LETS WIN THIS FOR MAPP!! #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Ann S.A.
timelineItems.text: Porter > McInerney #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Artie
timelineItems.text: I like this Porter kid. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Montreal Impact. Nigel Reo-Coker tries a through ball, but Cameron Porter is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Alex Fydryszewski
timelineItems.text: Mapp is a leader for #imfc and part of the heart and soul of the club. Hope he heals quickly.

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Will
timelineItems.text: Porter might establish himself as the team's best striker before the snow melts. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: Miguel Aguilar is not dispossessed easily. Noted. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Terry Hughston
timelineItems.text: Wow. Aguilar's footwork is fantastic. #DCU #MLS @dcunited

timelineItems.name: garrett holliday
timelineItems.text: Aguilar is a tank! #DCvMTL

timelineItems.name: Peter Galindo
timelineItems.text: FT: DC 1-0 #IMFC. Okay performance by the visitors. Still lacking an attacking edge, but having McInerney up top is better than Oduro.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Conor Doyle (D.C. United) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Sean Franklin.

timelineItems.name: Simon Tsalikis
timelineItems.text: Impact had 2 great scoring chances in last 15 min,need to finish, liked what I saw today #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: #IMFC good value for point but Bush's judgment gifts Arrieta game winner, #DCU got thru on rough pitch, #Mapp injury looks v. serious #MLS

timelineItems.name: Roni
timelineItems.text: Nice way to start the season, @dcunited! Here's to a great season! #DCU

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, D.C. United 1, Montreal Impact 0.
